subject: CSS
question:
What is the difference between:
.perro#gato (with no space)
.perro #gato (with space) ?
answer:
.perro#gato : This selects the specific element that has id gato and in addition the same element has the class perro.
.perro #gato : This selects any element that has id gato and that is inside of any element tha has the class perro
